properties.label: Method
properties.name: method
properties.hint: GET, POST, PUT or DELETE.  For PUT method, "id" is mandatory.

input.code:
# @param input [Hash] input hash supplied in the recipe step
# @return value returned in the last line
# Eg: Code for returning country code for an IP address
# {
#   country_code: get("http://freegeoip.net/json/" + input["ip_address"])
# }
json_str = input['json_string']
approval_action = input['approval_action'].is_true?
slack_hook = input['slack_hook']

json_str_hash = workato.parse_json(json_str)
approval_record = (json_str_hash['attachments'].first)
  if approval_record.present?
   # Set color code
  approval_action.is_true? ? approval_record['color'] = "2eb886" : approval_record['color'] = "a30200"

  # Reset actions
  approval_record['actions'] = []
end

# Post update
post(slack_hook, json_str_hash)
input.name: Prepare Response

message.footer: Perhaps the approval is processed already?
